    General hacks & shortcuts

    Multi-line editing

    • Use alt to mark multiple lines

    Commenting blocks

    • Use ctrl + Shift + c to comment/uncomment an entire code block

    Comment/uncomment blocks - Sometimes you want to quickly disable a chunk of code without deleting it. Use ğ—–ğ˜ğ—¿ğ—¹ + ğ—¦ğ—µğ—¶ğ—³ğ˜ + ğ—– to (un)comment entire code blocks. (3/7) pic.twitter.com/KOH65ic4zv

    Moving selections

    • Use alt_left + up/down to move selections up and down
